image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives
image.name: M001207_001

profileText: a Representative from Florida; born in Guayaquil, Ecuador, January 18, 1971; graduated from Pomona Catholic High School, Pomona, Calif., 1988; B.S., Pitzer College, Claremont, Calif., 1992; M.A., Claremont Graduate University, Claremont, Calif., 1996; consultant; faculty, Florida International University, Miami, Fla., 2003-2011; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-January 3, 2021); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress in 2020; unsuccessful candidate for the United States Senate in 2024.

asset.name: M001207_001
asset.creditLine: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives
